mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MARU_MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_CONNO.NEXTVAL, #{mno}, #{conLevel}, SYSDATE, NULL, 'Y', #{nmno})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MARU_MEMBER WHERE NMNO=#{nmno}
SELECT * FROM MARU_MEMBER M JOIN NARUMARU N ON(M.NMNO = N.NMNO) WHERE M.MNO=#{mno} AND NM_CATEGORY = 1
SELECT * FROM MARU_MEMBER MM JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MNO=MM.MNO) WHERE MM.NMNO=#{nmno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MARU_MEMBER WHERE NMNO=#{nmno} AND MNO=#{mno}
SELECT MNO FROM MARU_MEMBER WHERE CON_LEVEL=0 AND NMNO=#{nmno}

SELECT IM.INO , NM.NM_TITLE , IM.NMNO , (SELECT NICNAME FROM MARU_MEMBER MM JOIN MEMBER M ON(MM.MNO=M.MNO) WHERE MM.NMNO=NM.NMNO AND MM.CON_LEVEL=0 ) AS MARU_MANAGER FROM INVATE_MEMBER IM JOIN NARUMARU NM ON(IM.NMNO=NM.NMNO) WHERE NM.NM_CATEGORY = 1 AND IM.MNO = #{mno} ORDER BY IM.STATUS ASC, IM.INO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INVATE_MEMBER IM JOIN NARUMARU NM ON(IM.NMNO=NM.NMNO) WHERE NM.NM_CATEGORY = 1 AND IM.MNO = #{mno}
SELECT * FROM INVATE_MEMBER IM JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MNO = IM.MNO) WHERE IM.NMNO=#{nmno}
SELECT MNO FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
